amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-6 to require a study of the effects of child care assistance provided under section 2 of the underlying bill and on compliance with treatment protocols.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barr amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Barr.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
